description: I. Letter dated 26/10/2005 from I L Jenkins, Surgeon Vice Admiral regarding preparing for an influenza pandemic in UK Â– guidance for the defence medical services. 4 p. II. Surgeon's general policy letter dated 16/10/2007 regarding pandemic influenza - infection control guidance for military settings. 43 p. III. Surgeon's general policy letter dated 20/01/2006 regarding the use of influenza vaccines and anti-virals in the event of an influenza pandemic by the Defence medical services. 7 p.
